hero.title: Next-Gen AI-Powered Text Summarization
hero.subtitle: A modern, AI-powered tool for intelligent text summarization and keyword extraction built with cutting-edge technology.

overview.title: What We Do
overview.description: TextSummarizer leverages state-of-the-art artificial intelligence to help you quickly understand key points from large volumes of text through powerful summarization. Whether you're a researcher, student, content creator, or business professional, our tool helps you save reading time and grasp essential information faster.

summarization.title: Intelligent Summarization
summarization.description: Our AI models understand context and meaning to create accurate, coherent summaries that preserve the most important information while dramatically reducing reading time.

keywords.title: Smart Keyword Extraction
keywords.description: Automatically identify and extract the most relevant terms, concepts, and topics from your text to help with research, SEO, and content organization.

summaryLengths.title: Multiple Summary Lengths
summaryLengths.description: Choose from short, medium, or long summaries based on your needs and time constraints.

fileSupport.title: File Upload Support
fileSupport.description: Directly upload and summarize TXT, PDF, and DOCX files without manual text extraction.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode Support
darkMode.description: Comfortable viewing experience with automatic dark mode detection and manual toggle.

exportShare.title: Export & Share
exportShare.description: Export your summarization results as PDF or share them directly with colleagues and friends.

history.title: Summary History
history.description: Keep track of all your summarizations with persistent local storage and easy navigation.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data is processed securely and never stored permanently on our servers.

cta.title: Ready to Start Summarizing?
cta.description: Experience the power of AI-driven text summarization. Upload your documents or paste your text to get started with intelligent summarization and keyword extraction.
